thread.title: United Airlines U.S. flights grounded due to computer issue - FAA
thread.title_full: United Airlines U.S. flights grounded due to computer issue - FAA | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: United Airlines U.S. flights grounded due to computer issue - FAA
text:
July 8 United Continental Holdings Inc mainline flights were grounded at all U.S. airports on Wednesday due to computer issues, the Federal Aviation Administration said.
The agency said flights on United's regional partners were no longer affected by the grounding, according to the FAA. (Reporting by Jeffrey Dastin ; Editing by Jeffrey Benkoe)
